quote: A good teacher can inspire hope, ignite the imagination, and instill a love of learning.
name: Brad Henry

quote: You can't depend on your eyes when your imagination is out of focus.
name: Mark Twain

quote: The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge but imagination.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: There are no rules of architecture for a castle in the clouds.
name: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: The power of imagination makes us infinite.
name: John Muir

quote: Logic will get you from A to B. Imagination will take you everywhere.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: The world of reality has its limits; the world of imagination is boundless.
name: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: When you're curious, you find lots of interesting things to do.
name: Walt Disney

quote: Every block of stone has a statue inside it and it is the task of the sculptor to discover it.
name: Michelangelo

quote: This world is but a canvas to our imagination.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: All religion, my friend, is simply evolved out of fraud, fear, greed, imagination, and poetry.
name: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: I only hope that we don't lose sight of one thing - that it was all started by a mouse.
name: Walt Disney

quote: They who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night.
name: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: I saw the angel in the marble and carved until I set him free.
name: Michelangelo

quote: Technology, like art, is a soaring exercise of the human imagination.
name: Daniel Bell

quote: Imagination will often carry us to worlds that never were. But without it we go nowhere.
name: Carl Sagan

quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: I like nonsense; it wakes up the brain cells.
name: Dr. Seuss

quote: You're only given a little spark of madness. You mustn't lose it.
name: Robin Williams

quote: Hope lies in dreams, in imagination, and in the courage of those who dare to make dreams into reality.
name: Jonas Salk

quote: I have always imagined that Paradise will be a kind of library.
name: Jorge Luis Borges

quote: The only limit to your impact is your imagination and commitment.
name: Tony Robbins

quote: Imagination is the only key to the future. Without it none exists - with it all things are possible.
name: Ida Tarbell

quote: Why does the eye see a thing more clearly in dreams than the imagination when awake?
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: My imagination is a monastery and I am its monk.
name: John Keats

quote: Happiness is not an ideal of reason, but of imagination.
name: Immanuel Kant

quote: There are lots of people who mistake their imagination for their memory.
name: Josh Billings

quote: If you can imagine it, you can achieve it. If you can dream it, you can become it.
name: William Arthur Ward

quote: We are more often frightened than hurt; and we suffer more from imagination than from reality.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
name: Pablo Picasso

quote: Those who do not want to imitate anything, produce nothing.
name: Salvador Dali

quote: Fantasy mirrors desire. Imagination reshapes it.
name: Mason Cooley

quote: A great wind is blowing, and that gives you either imagination or a headache.
name: Catherine the Great

quote: Where there is no imagination there is no horror.
name: Arthur Conan Doyle

quote: Intelligence is the wife, imagination is the mistress, memory is the servant.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: To bring anything into your life, imagine that it's already there.
name: Richard Bach

quote: I do not stick to rules when cooking. I rely on my imagination.
name: Akshay Kumar

quote: If you want a vision of the future, imagine a boot stamping on a human face - forever.
name: George Orwell

quote: One can live in the shadow of an idea without grasping it.
name: Elizabeth Bowen

quote: Every great advance in science has issued from a new audacity of imagination.
name: John Dewey

quote: Imagination is the true magic carpet.
name: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: True change takes place in the imagination.
name: Unknown

quote: I learned a long time ago that reality was much weirder than anyone's imagination.
name: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: The visionary starts with a clean sheet of paper, and re-imagines the world.
name: Malcolm Gladwell

quote: The man who has no imagination has no wings.
name: Muhammad Ali

quote: To invent, you need a good imagination and a pile of junk.
name: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Nobody is bored when he is trying to make something that is beautiful, or to discover something that is true.
name: William Inge

quote: With the brush we merely tint, while the imagination alone produces colour.
name: Theodore Gericault

quote: What we wish, we readily believe, and what we ourselves think, we imagine others think also.
name: Julius Caesar

quote: My job is to make sure there's something about each dress that ignites the bride's imagination.
name: Jenny Packham

quote: Imagination is the highest kite one can fly.
name: Lauren Bacall

quote: You have to really use your imagination to refresh your daily life.
name: Eric-Emmanuel Schmitt

quote: I'm an optimistic guy. I'm one of those big dreamers. I'm one of those kids with that annoying imagination.
name: Tyler, The Creator

quote: Imagination is the real and eternal world of which this vegetable universe is but a faint shadow.
name: William Blake

quote: Uttering a word is like striking a note on the keyboard of the imagination.
name: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quote: We say God and the imagination are one... How high that highest candle lights the dark.
name: Wallace Stevens

quote: Illustrations can be a big window: a looking glass into the author's imagination.
name: Tony DiTerlizzi

quote: True originality consists not in a new manner but in a new vision.
name: Edith Wharton

quote: Imagination is everything. It is the preview of life's coming attractions.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Reason is the natural order of truth; but imagination is the organ of meaning.
name: C. S. Lewis

quote: Think left and think right and think low and think high. Oh, the thinks you can think up if only you try!
name: Dr. Seuss

quote: When you believe in what you're doing and use your imagination and initiative, you can make a difference.
name: Samuel Dash

quote: Great ideas originate in the muscles.
name: Thomas A. Edison

quote: The saddest thing I can imagine is to get used to luxury.
name: Charlie Chaplin

quote: My imagination is a twisted place.
name: Taylor Swift

quote: No amount of skillful invention can replace the essential element of imagination.
name: Edward Hopper

quote: You can't do it unless you can imagine it.
name: George Lucas

quote: Be drawn to the visual arts for it can expand your imagination.
name: Barbara Januszkiewicz

quote: Imagination is like the drunk man who lost his watch and must get drunk again to find it.
name: Guy Davenport

quote: See that the imagination of nature is far, far greater than the imagination of man.
name: Richard P. Feynman

quote: Our thoughts and imagination are the only real limits to our possibilities.
name: Orison Swett Marden

quote: People write memoirs because they lack the imagination to make things up.
name: Tom Robbins

quote: Vision is the true creative rhythm.
name: Robert Delaunay

quote: The lunatic, the lover, and the poet, are of imagination all compact.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: I am certain of nothing but the holiness of the heart's affections, and the truth of imagination.
name: John Keats

quote: I just have a relationship with my imagination. It's like my friend, almost.
name: Steven Wright

quote: The nose of a mob is its imagination. By this, at any time, it can be quietly led.
name: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: To accomplish great things we must first dream, then visualize, then plan... believe... act!
name: Alfred A. Montapert

quote: A certificate of live birth is not the same thing by any stretch of the imagination as a birth certificate.
name: Donald Trump

quote: I paint objects as I think them, not as I see them.
name: Pablo Picasso

quote: The imagination is a muscle. If it is not exercised, it atrophies.
name: Neil Gaiman

quote: I want to reach the heights of stardom beyond my imagination.
name: Ranbir Kapoor

quote: Live out of your imagination, not your history.
name: Stephen Covey

quote: There are many ways to be free. One of them is to transcend reality by imagination, as I try to do.
name: Anais Nin

quote: My imagination can picture no fairer happiness than to continue living for art.
name: Clara Schumann

quote: Love is the triumph of imagination over intelligence.
name: H. L. Mencken

quote: What the imagination seizes as beauty must be truth.
name: John Keats

quote: What is now proved was once only imagined.
name: William Blake

quote: Imagination is the key to my lyrics. The rest is painted with a little science fiction.
name: Jimi Hendrix

quote: There is hope in dreams, imagination, and in the courage of those who wish to make those dreams a reality.
name: Jonas Salk

quote: The artist must bow to the monster of his own imagination.
name: Richard Wright

quote: Imagination is a very potent thing, and in the uneducated often usurps the place of genuine experience.
name: H. P. Lovecraft

quote: The great instrument of moral good is the imagination.
name: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quote: I accept that there may be things far grander and more incomprehensible than we can possibly imagine.
name: Richard Dawkins

quote: Nature's imagination is so boundless compared to our own meager human imagination.
name: James Cameron

quote: The soul without imagination is what an observatory would be without a telescope.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Justice is to be found only in imagination.
name: Alfred Nobel

quote: Imagination has a great deal to do with winning.
name: Mike Krzyzewski

quote: If you're not a daydreamer, you haven't got any imagination.
name: David Cassidy

quote: In the world of words, the imagination is one of the forces of nature.
name: Wallace Stevens

quote: Genius is an African who dreams up snow.
name: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: In imagination, there's no limitation.
name: Mark Victor Hansen

quote: Preschool children are virtuosos of imagination.
name: Benjamin Spock

quote: Falling in love consists merely in uncorking the imagination and bottling the common sense.
name: Helen Rowland

quote: A good comic explores the imagination, but it's always got to have those notes of truth running through it.
name: Michael Pena

quote: Like all novelists, I'm interested in the filters between reality and the imagination.
name: Hisham Matar

quote: I always imagined I could be what I wanted to be.
name: Chris Brown

quote: Panic is a sudden desertion of us, and a going over to the enemy of our imagination.
name: Christian Nestell Bovee

quote: It is above all by the imagination that we achieve perception and compassion and hope.
name: Ursula K. Le Guin

quote: Happiness is ideal, it is the work of the imagination.
name: Marquis de Sade

quote: When something is such a creative medium as the web, the limits to it are our imagination.
name: Tim Berners-Lee

quote: I can imagine few things more trying to the patience than the long wasted days of waiting.
name: Robert Falcon Scott

quote: The past is really almost as much a work of the imagination as the future.
name: Jessamyn West

quote: We especially need imagination in science.
name: Maria Mitchell

quote: Imagination - that's the future for us.
name: Jan Brett

quote: Imagination allows you to bend the rules of the temporal world.
name: Amy Sherald

quote: I suppose I have an active imagination, and writing allows me to live it out.
name: Richard Paul Evans

quote: Solitude is as needful to the imagination as society is wholesome for the character.
name: James Russell Lowell

quote: The imagination is man's power over nature.
name: Wallace Stevens

quote: I've spent my life butting my head against other people's lack of imagination.
name: Nick Cave

quote: I have more of a vivid imagination than I have talent. I cook up ideas. It's just a characteristic.
name: Francis Ford Coppola

quote: I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Love is a canvas furnished by nature and embroidered by imagination.
name: Voltaire

quote: To have a great idea, have a lot of them.
name: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Imagination and fiction make up more than three quarters of our real life.
name: Simone Weil

quote: Science does not know its debt to imagination.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Reality leaves a lot to the imagination.
name: John Lennon

quote: Imagination rules the world.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: It is usually the imagination that is wounded first, rather than the heart; it being much more sensitive.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: People who lean on logic and philosophy and rational exposition end by starving the best part of the mind.
name: William Butler Yeats

quote: The imagination imitates. It is the critical spirit that creates.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: I love fantasy; I love imagination - that's the inner child in me.
name: Hannah John-Kamen

quote: Do not quench your inspiration and your imagination; do not become the slave of your model.
name: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: If I create from the heart, nearly everything works; if from the head, almost nothing.
name: Marc Chagall

quote: Cowardice... is almost always simply a lack of ability to suspend functioning of the imagination.
name: Ernest Hemingway

quote: The debt we owe to the play of imagination is incalculable.
name: Carl Jung

quote: I think that all things, in their way, reflect heavenly truth, the imagination not least.
name: C. S. Lewis

quote: This is one of those cases in which the imagination is baffled by the facts.
name: Adam Smith

quote: Imagination decides everything.
name: Blaise Pascal

quote: My view is that at a younger age your optimism is more and you have more imagination etc. You have less bias.
name: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Imagination is a beast that has to be put in a cage.
name: Timothy Spall

quote: Nature uses human imagination to lift her work of creation to even higher levels.
name: Luigi Pirandello

quote: I'm a dreamer with lots of energy and a vivid imagination. That's the recipe for becoming an entertainer.
name: Goldie Hawn

quote: Knowledge is a polite word for dead but not buried imagination.
name: e. e. cummings

quote: The human race is governed by its imagination.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: He is the true enchanter, whose spell operates, not upon the senses, but upon the imagination and the heart.
name: Washington Irving

quote: When you start to develop your powers of empathy and imagination, the whole world opens up to you.
name: Susan Sarandon

quote: Few people have the imagination for reality.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: An idea is salvation by imagination.
name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: He who does not think much of himself is much more esteemed than he imagines.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: I used my imagination to make the grass whatever color I wanted it to be.
name: Whoopi Goldberg

quote: Cinema is a world of imagination.
name: Marjane Satrapi

quote: I try to decorate my imagination as much as I can.
name: Franz Schubert

quote: A lady's imagination is very rapid; it jumps from admiration to love, from love to matrimony in a moment.
name: Jane Austen

quote: Well, I think that - I think leadership's always been about two main things: imagination and courage.
name: Paul Keating

quote: I believed in myself. I never imagined myself as just an ordinary player.
name: Imran Khan

quote: Vulgarity begins when imagination succumbs to the explicit.
name: Doris Day

quote: I imagine that yes is the only living thing.
name: e. e. cummings

quote: The most imaginative people are the most credulous, for them everything is possible.
name: Alexander Chase

quote: I always wanted to ride a dragon myself, so I decided to do this for a year in my imagination.
name: Cornelia Funke

quote: I had a very happy childhood, but I still used my imagination as a leisure resort.
name: Geraldine McCaughrean

quote: Nothing is more fearful than imagination without taste.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: The courage to imagine the otherwise is our greatest resource, adding color and suspense to all our life.
name: Daniel J. Boorstin

quote: There is no such thing as death; life is only a dream, and we are the imagination of ourselves.
name: Bill Hicks

quote: The imagination is the golden pathway to everywhere.
name: Terence McKenna

quote: The faking of feelings is a sin against the imagination.
name: Seamus Heaney

quote: The imagination is such as powerful tool: suggestion is all you need. People fill in gaps.
name: Fiona Barton

quote: What I love most about animation is, it's a team sport, and everything we do is about pure imagination.
name: Jeffrey Katzenberg

quote: Sometimes I feel like a figment of my own imagination.
name: Lily Tomlin

quote: Scientists have to have a metaphor. All scientists start with imagination.
name: Ray Bradbury

quote: Some stories are true that never happened.
name: Elie Wiesel

quote: They are ill discoverers that think there is no land, when they can see nothing but sea.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: There can be no passion, and by consequence no love, where there is not imagination.
name: William Godwin

quote: The realities of the world seldom measure up to the sublime designs of human imagination.
name: Bryant H. McGill

quote: A hunch is creativity trying to tell you something.
name: Frank Capra

quote: I am not interested in slice of life, what I want is a slice of the imagination.
name: Carlos Fuentes

quote: People can die of mere imagination.
name: Geoffrey Chaucer

quote: Given free rein, our imagination can get infinite.
name: Jim Harrison

quote: Were it not for imagination a man would be as happy in arms of a chambermaid as of a duchess.
name: Samuel Johnson

quote: He who has imagination without learning has wings but no feet.
name: Joseph Joubert

quote: To imagine is everything, to know is nothing at all.
name: Anatole France

quote: Obviously the imagination is fueled by emotions beyond the control of the conscious mind.
name: Joyce Carol Oates

quote: Belief in the supernatural reflects a failure of the imagination.
name: Edward Abbey

quote: Trust that little voice in your head that says 'Wouldn't it be interesting if...'; And then do it.
name: Duane Michals

quote: Life is not so bad if you have plenty of luck, a good physique, and not too much imagination.
name: Christopher Isherwood

quote: I was a wild, mischievous kid, and I had tremendous imagination. Any experience I had, I'd try to reenact it.
name: Adrien Brody

quote: Don Quixote's misfortune is not his imagination, but Sancho Panza.
name: Franz Kafka

quote: Reason respects the differences, and imagination the similitudes of things.
name: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quote: Doubt is the father of invention.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: I just had a crazy, wild imagination all my life, and science fiction is the greatest outlet for me.
name: Steven Spielberg

quote: We humans lack imagination, to the point of not even knowing what tomorrow's important things will look like.
name: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quote: Imagination needs to be fed.
name: Barbara Januszkiewicz

quote: Imagination... its limits are only those of the mind itself.
name: Rod Serling

quote: Imagination is a poor matter when it has to part company with understanding.
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: I've learned that borders are where the actual ends, but also where the imagination and the story begins.
name: Amy Purdy

quote: Our imagination is the only limit to what we can hope to have in the future.
name: Charles Kettering

quote: Let us leave pretty women to men devoid of imagination.
name: Marcel Proust

quote: Reason clears and plants the wilderness of the imagination to harvest the wheat of art.
name: Austin O'Malley

quote: I loved the world of imagination.
name: R. A. Salvatore

quote: The travel writer seeks the world we have lost - the lost valleys of the imagination.
name: Alexander Cockburn

quote: All men who have achieved great things have been great dreamers.
name: Orison Swett Marden

quote: The more ships have grown in size and consequence, the more their place in our imagination has shrunk.
name: Rose George

quote: Make sure you visualize what you really want, not what someone else wants for you.
name: Jerry Gillies

quote: I was raised not to be afraid to show emotion or imagination.
name: Javier Bardem

quote: What we imagine is order is merely the prevailing form of chaos.
name: Kerry Thornley

quote: With me, writing is 60% imagination, 30% people you know and 10% you don't know where it comes from.
name: Terrence McNally

quote: My books are inert as cordwood till a reader's imagination ignites one and an old flame jumps to life.
name: David James Duncan

quote: To treat your facts with imagination is one thing, to imagine your facts is another.
name: John Burroughs

quote: Liberty: One of Imagination's most precious possessions.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Faith is spiritualized imagination.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: I believe that imagination inspires nations. It's something that I live by.
name: Janelle Monae

quote: Taste refers to the past, imagination to the future.
name: Mason Cooley

quote: Truth titillates the imagination far less than fiction.
name: Marquis de Sade

quote: We cast away priceless time in dreams, born of imagination, fed upon illusion, and put to death by reality.
name: Judy Garland

quote: The scientific imagination always restrains itself within the limits of probability.
name: Thomas Huxley

quote: I can't work completely out of my imagination. I must put my foot in a bit of truth; and then I can fly free.
name: Andrew Wyeth

quote: Life is only a dream and we are the imagination of ourselves.
name: Bill Hicks

quote: Imagination is at the root of much that passes for love.
name: Gilbert Parker

quote: There are no shortcuts in life - only those we imagine.
name: Frank Leahy

quote: If I am writing down something and it is my idea, my imagination, it won't be fact.
name: Disha Patani

quote: The most dire disaster in love is the death of imagination.
name: George Meredith

quote: I have a visual imagination.
name: Sylvia Plath

quote: It's amazing what you can do with an E in A-Level art, a twisted imagination and a chainsaw.
name: Damien Hirst

quote: It takes no imagination to live within your means.
name: Francis Ford Coppola

quote: There aren't any fences to the imagination, and so there shouldn't be any for books.
name: Matt Haig

quote: One is never fortunate or as unfortunate as one imagines.
name: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: With imagination and personal creativity, people who sew can design the way they look to suit themselves.
name: Issey Miyake

quote: The first piece of music that captured my imagination was probably Ray Charles Live At Newport.
name: Van Morrison

quote: I'm very conscious that people dear to me are alive in my imagination - poets in particular.
name: Seamus Heaney

quote: I do not 'get' ideas; ideas get me.
name: Robertson Davies

quote: I am putting real plums into an imaginary cake.
name: Mary McCarthy

quote: Bring ideas in and entertain them royally, for one of them may be the king.
name: Mark Van Doren

quote: Fiction reveals truths that reality obscures.
name: Jessamyn West

quote: Then I decided to draw from and on my own imagination, and everything came out perfect.
name: Jack Prelutsky

quote: When one paints an ideal, one does not need to limit one's imagination.
name: Ellen Key

quote: If you have a good inner life, you don't get lonely. I've got a good imagination. I don't miss romance.
name: Diana Rigg

quote: Literary imagination is an aesthetic object offered by a writer to a lover of books.
name: Gaston Bachelard

quote: But who can paint like Nature? Can imagination boast, amid its gay creation, hues like hers?
name: James Thomson

quote: I use a lot of film images, analogies, and imagination.
name: Carlos Fuentes

quote: Philosophy and Art both render the invisible visible by imagination.
name: George Henry Lewes

quote: Imagination is a funny thing - we sometimes need to see something before we can truly picture it.
name: Tomi Adeyemi

quote: Possessing a healthy imagination is a necessary ingredient for creativity.
name: Steve Vai

quote: You are indebted to you imagination for three-fourths of your importance.
name: David Garrick

quote: Imagination is but another name for super intelligence.
name: Edgar Rice Burroughs

quote: Jehovah God is truly rich far beyond the imagination of humankind.
name: Joseph Franklin Rutherford

quote: I think I've got a decent imagination. I hope some of my stories inspire other young imaginations.
name: Tony DiTerlizzi

quote: I used to lie in bed in my flat and imagine what would happen if there was a zombie attack.
name: Simon Pegg

quote: I like endings that let your imagination do a lot of the work.
name: Matt Bomer

quote: I am pretty scare-able. I guess that is why I like doing horror because my imagination can take me places.
name: Annabeth Gish

quote: My imagination is my polestar; I steer by that.
name: Clive Barker

quote: The power of imagination is infinite.
name: John Tiffany

quote: Love and the imagination are connected.
name: Ali Smith

quote: I wouldn't say that I've had a tough life by any stretch of the imagination.
name: Duncan Sheik

quote: I mean, the most important thing to me is imagination.
name: Rob Walton

quote: People's imagination is the most effective tool in creating terror or dread.
name: Matt Reeves

quote: When you live in a world of imagination, your imagination doesn't necessarily grow old with you.
name: Leslie Bricusse

quote: I'm really quite normal. My imagination has some serious kinks in it, that's all.
name: Allan Guthrie

quote: I'll be happy if I can gain even the smallest place inside the literary imagination of U.S. readers.
name: Elliot Perlman

quote: The only sure weapon against bad ideas is better ideas.
name: Alfred Whitney Griswold

quote: I love the paranormal, because there, every genre I write can become one beacon for my imagination.
name: Leslie Banks

quote: The imagination is a pretty precious source of protection.
name: Nicholas Ray

quote: I always have this imagination, something I want to use. I don't understand the idea of leisure time.
name: Cher Wang

quote: One of the virtues of being very young is that you don't let the facts get in the way of your imagination.
name: Sam Levenson

quote: Ideas control the world.
name: James A. Garfield

quote: I never in my wildest imagination dreamed that I would somehow become a sports commentator.
name: Joe Rogan

quote: My imagination makes me human and makes me a fool; it gives me all the world, and exiles me from it.
name: Ursula K. Le Guin

quote: Imagination has rules, but we can only guess what they are.
name: Mason Cooley

quote: Fools act on imagination without knowledge, pedants act on knowledge without imagination.
name: Alfred North Whitehead

quote: We are all innovators, we all like to use our imagination, which is our greatest tool.
name: Cory Booker

quote: A writer should have the precision of a poet and the imagination of a scientist.
name: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: Imagination is the eye of the soul.
name: Joseph Joubert

quote: One who has imagination without learning has wings without feet.
name: Joseph Joubert

quote: I've done a lot of bad things. Use your imagination.
name: Katy Perry

quote: I live in my imagination, so sometimes movies help me get lost. I feel like I'm in it.
name: SZA

quote: One longs for a director with a sense of imagination.
name: Alan Rickman

quote: Life is possible only by the deficiencies of our imagination and memory.
name: Emil Cioran

quote: You know what's better than building things up in your imagination? Building things up in real life.
name: Ryan Holiday

quote: I had a pretty sexual imagination for a kid.
name: Janet Jackson

quote: An idea is a putting truth in check-mate.
name: Jose Ortega y Gasset

quote: You need imagination in order to imagine a future that doesn't exist.
name: Azar Nafisi

quote: What I really have in my head, my imagination, my understanding of music, I never really get that out.
name: Wynton Marsalis

quote: While the sciences are hugely important, let us not leave behind a child's imagination.
name: Kevin Spacey

quote: I've always had a slightly overactive imagination.
name: Daniel Radcliffe

quote: To have frequent recourse to narrative betrays great want of imagination.
name: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield

quote: I enjoy working on a movie that lets your imagination run wild, it's great to be a part of and watch.
name: Chris Hemsworth

quote: Imagination creates reality.
name: Richard Wagner

quote: 'Castle' is a guy living in a fantasy world. He's in his imagination, writing these stories of murder.
name: Nathan Fillion

quote: Because of my faith and my imagination, I was able to enjoy my childhood, even though it was tough.
name: Donna Brazile

quote: Man lives by imagination.
name: Havelock Ellis

quote: Believing you're something that you're not excites the mind and the imagination. And it's hopeful.
name: Orlando Bloom

quote: The American imagination has never been able to fully recover from its white-supremacist beginnings.
name: Claudia Rankine

quote: Personally, I would sooner have written Alice in Wonderland than the whole Encyclopedia Britannica.
name: Stephen Leacock

quote: I have a very vivid imagination.
name: Janice Dickinson

quote: I do like to wrap things up and leave some things to the readers' imagination.
name: Rick Riordan

quote: The unfortunate reality is the alt-right has captured white people's imagination.
name: Patrisse Cullors

quote: Learn to see things as they really are, not as we imagine they are.
name: Vernon Howard

quote: To speak of morals in art is to speak of legislature in sex. Art is the sex of the imagination.
name: George Jean Nathan

quote: There's no reason for your imagination to be fettered by money.
name: Kevin McCloud

quote: My mom worked late, and I was at home a lot by myself. It was good for my imagination - and bad for it, too.
name: Sarah Paulson

quote: I've always had an active imagination.
name: Rickie Lee Jones

quote: Imagination in the child is powerful. Reading and laughter and love are essential in our lives.
name: Malachy McCourt

quote: I believe in the imagination. What I cannot see is infinitely more important than what I can see.
name: Duane Michals

quote: What better way to expand your imagination than to read!
name: Laura Marano

quote: If my accent betrayed my foreign birth, it also stamped me as an enemy, in the imagination of the producers.
name: Bela Lugosi

quote: We can live with lots of things, but we can't live without imagination, we can't live without hope.
name: Ariel Dorfman

quote: Television contracts the imagination and radio expands it.
name: Terry Wogan

quote: I'm not a passive person by any stretch of the imagination.
name: Courteney Cox

quote: The best way to renew thought is to go outside the human imagination.
name: Bernard Werber

quote: The imagination is part of the arsenal that actors draw from.
name: Bryan Cranston

quote: My imagination is so far out there already. People couldn't imagine what goes on in my brain.
name: Missy Elliott

quote: Students are rewarded for memorization, not imagination or resourcefulness.
name: Sugata Mitra

quote: Learning is the new skill. Imagination, creation and asking new questions are at its core.
name: Sugata Mitra

quote: My imagination can do whatever it wants to do. This gives me a great sense of freedom.
name: Lloyd Alexander

quote: Loving a country is an act of the imagination.
name: Michael Ignatieff

quote: This is not a family of privilege by any stretch of the imagination. Our family is very low key.
name: Maya Soetoro-Ng

quote: A person possessed with an idea cannot be reasoned with.
name: James Anthony Froude

quote: We may not imagine how our lives could be more frustrating and complex - but Congress can.
name: Cullen Hightower

quote: India lends itself well to fictionalization, but ultimately, it all depends on the writer's imagination.
name: Chitra Banerjee Divakaruni

quote: I don't think it's possible to touch people's imagination today by aesthetic means.
name: J. G. Ballard

quote: Wine and women do not go with song. Alcohol is the worst enemy of the imagination.
name: Patrick Kavanagh

quote: I visualize things in my mind before I have to do them. It's like having a mental workshop.
name: Jack Youngblood

quote: I imagine, therefore I belong and am free.
name: Lawrence Durrell

quote: You - and I have to remind myself of this - are capable beyond your wildest imagination.
name: Priscilla Chan

quote: The idea of love as a mysterious, undiscovered world has come to have no place in our innermost imagination.
name: John Cassavetes

quote: Woman is the sun, an extraordinary creature, one that makes the imagination gallop.
name: Marcello Mastroianni

quote: Reading changes your perspective and feeds your imagination.
name: Najat Vallaud-Belkacem

quote: I live in words. I like looking at things, but I don't have a strong visual imagination.
name: Colm Toibin

quote: Mine is not an autonomous imagination.
name: Jay McInerney

quote: I guess what I've learned is that there are no boundaries when it comes to imagination. It's limitless.
name: Cliff Martinez

quote: I am better able to imagine hell than heaven; it is my inheritance, I suppose.
name: Elinor Wylie
